title: NIA summons Sikh activist who protested against father’s death in Behbal Kalan police firing
selftext: Sukhraj Singh has announced that he will contest the upcoming Gidderbaha Assembly bypoll in Punjab.
comments:
Previous coverage on this :

THis is how home ministry will function until that criminal Amit Shah is running. Asshole wants unchallenged power.
